content: --वीरः, --वीरकः {1} a sword or scimitar. {2} a cemetery. {3} <ab>N.</ab> of a town in the <ab n="South(ern) Marāṭhā (Mahārāṣṭra)">S. M.</ab> country. {4} a kind of tree. (--रा red arsenic. (--री {1} a woman who has borne a son, a mother {2} <ab>N.</ab> of Aditi. {3} a good cow. (--रं the flower of the tree.
